      • isTracking

        public boolean isTracking​(java.lang.String mapItemUid)
        Check if we currently tracking this Geo Fence If the monitor is set to custom, but has no tracked items, then ignore tracking
        Parameters:
        mapItemUid - the uid for the map item
        Returns:
        true if the item is currently being tracked

      • isTracking

        public boolean isTracking​(GeoFence geofence)
        Check if we currently tracking this Geo Fence
        Parameters:
        geofence - the geofence to be considered
        Returns:
        true if the geofence map item is being tracked

      • dismiss

        public void dismiss​(GeoFenceMonitor monitor,
                    GeoFenceAlerting.Alert alert,
                    boolean bStopMonitoring)
        Dismisses a specific alert for a monitor
        Parameters:
        monitor - Monitor
        alert - Alert
        bStopMonitoring - True to stop monitoring the alert item False to just dismiss the alert

      • dismiss

        public void dismiss​(GeoFenceMonitor monitor,
                    PointMapItem item,
                    boolean bStopMonitoring)
        Dismisses the last alert for a given map item
        Parameters:
        monitor - Monitor
        item - if null, dismiss all current alerts
        bStopMonitoring - if item is not null, this specifies whether to stop monitoring item XXX - This is either misleading or not coded properly It actually turns the entire monitor off, for some reason
